description:
Notes in bar 15 omitted to make this easier to play, and closer to an intermediate (grade 4 or grade 5 level) arrangement. Please note that this approximation of the guitar solo has been created for educational purposes. For an accurate "note for note" version, please refer to the official Metallica version of this song, NOT the Southampton Guitar Academy scale study version here.
(via editor)
title: Fade To Black - Metallica (Intro solo using Natural minor scale shapes rooted on E and A strings)
Fade To Black - Metallica (Intro solo using Natural minor scale shapes rooted on E and A strings)
